@the_wanderer wrote:

Wherever you see:

Change that to:

playerCommand.substring(5).toLowerCase()

item.title: [PI] Yell Capitalizing
item.dc:creator: @Nonamee Nonamee
item.description:
@Nonamee wrote:

Whenever I yell, it capitalizes the first letter. How do I make it not do that? Here’s my yell command.

[code] if (playerCommand.startsWith(“yell”)) {
for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) {
if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) {
Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j];

						if (c.isDonator == 1 && (c.playerRights < 1 || c.playerRights > 3)){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=6081134>[Donator]</col><img=0>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 1){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Mod]</col><img=1>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 2){
							c2.sendMessage("<col=255>[Admin]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("flame")){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Owner/Coder]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
						}else if (c.playerRights == 3){
							c2.sendMessage("<shad=255>[Owner/Coder]</col><img=2>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
											+ Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.voteLevels == 10){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 11){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 12){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 13){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 14){
   }else if (c.voteLevels == 15){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 16){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 17){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 18){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
   }else if (c.voteLevels == 19){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting  Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
		       }else if (c.voteLevels == 20){
    c2.sendMessage("<shad=15695415>[Voting Master]</col>"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
				}else if (c.playerRights == 0){
    c2.sendMessage("[Player]"+ Misc.optimizeText(c.playerName) +": "
        + Misc.optimizeText(playerCommand.substring(5)) +"");
								
						}
					}
				}
			}[/code]
